snippet: Coastal erosion near Matunuck has imperiled seafront structures and threatened the only road that residents can use to get in and out.
abstract: South Kingstown Journal; coastal erosion near South Kingstown, RI, neighborhood Matunuck has imperiled seafront structures and threatened the only road that residents can use to get in and out; state has approved, on appeal, the town's application to shore up the road with a metal wall, but some beachfront property owners are concerned that the wall could exacerbate erosion in front of it.
lead_paragraph: Coastal erosion near Matunuck has imperiled seafront structures and threatened the only road that residents can use to get in and out.

headline.main: In Rhode Island, Protecting a Shoreline and a Lifeline
headline.print_headline: In Rhode Island, Protecting a Shoreline and a Lifeline
